description: Sum of first a(n) primes is a lucky number.
mathematica: lst = Range[1, 1700000, 2]; i = 2; While[ i <= (len = Length@lst) && (k = lst[[i]]) <= len, lst = Drop[lst, {k, len, k}]; i++ ]; lst2 = {}; s = 0; Do[s = s + Prime@n; If[MemberQ[lst, s], Print[n]; AppendTo[lst2, n]], {n, 687}]; lst2 (* _Robert G. Wilson v_ *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Jun 15 1998.
extensions: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 12 2006
